Namespace: block

block

Methods for interacting with the Block Storage endpoints
https://www.vultr.com/api/#block
Source:
  • block.js, line 1

Methods

attach(parameters)

Attach a block storage subscription to a VPS subscription. The instance will be restarted.
The block storage volume must not be attached to any other VPS subscriptions for this to work.
https://www.vultr.com/api/#block_attach
Parameters:
Name Type Description
parameters object
Properties
Name Type Attributes Default Description
SUBID number ID of the block storage subscription to attach.
attach_to_SUBID number ID of the VPS subscription to mount the block storage subscription to.
live string <optional>
 'no' 'yes' or 'no'. If 'yes', this will be attached to the instance without a restart (requires support from the instance's operating system).
Source:
  • block.js, line 7

create(parameters)

Create a block storage subscription.
https://www.vultr.com/api/#block_create
Parameters:
Name Type Description
parameters object
Properties
Name Type Attributes Description
DCID number ID of the location to create this subscription in.
size_gb number Size (in GB) of this subscription.
label string <optional>
 Text label that will be associated with the subscription.
Source:
  • block.js, line 39

delete(parameters)

Delete a block storage subscription. All data will be permanently lost. There is no going back from this call.
https://www.vultr.com/api/#block_delete
Parameters:
Name Type Description
parameters object
Properties
Name Type Description
SUBID number ID of the block storage subscription to delete.
Source:
  • block.js, line 70

detach(parameters)

Detach a block storage subscription from the currently attached instance. The instance will be restarted.
We do not recommend using live detaches unless you are certain that the volume has been unmounted from your operating system.
Detaching a mounted volume may result in data loss/corruption.
https://www.vultr.com/api/#block_detach
Parameters:
Name Type Description
parameters object
Properties
Name Type Description
SUBID number ID of the block storage subscription to detach.
Source:
  • block.js, line 91

list(parameters)

Retrieve a list of any active block storage subscriptions on this account.
https://www.vultr.com/api/#block_block_list
Parameters:
Name Type Description
parameters object
Properties
Name Type Attributes Description
SUBID number <optional>
 Unique identifier of a subscription. Only the subscription object will be returned.
Source:
  • block.js, line 140

resize(parameters)

Resize the block storage volume to a new size.
WARNING: When shrinking the volume, you must manually shrink the filesystem and partitions beforehand, or you will lose data.
https://www.vultr.com/api/#block_resize
Parameters:
Name Type Description
parameters object
Properties
Name Type Description
SUBID number ID of the block storage subscription to resize.
resize number New size (in GB) of the block storage subscription.
Source:
  • block.js, line 161

setLabel(parameters)

Set the label of a block storage subscription.
https://www.vultr.com/api/#block_label_set
Parameters:
Name Type Description
parameters object
Properties
Name Type Description
SUBID number ID of the block storage subscription.
label string Text label that will be shown in the control panel.
Source:
